column2: We are seeking motivated and experienced professional who can effectively contribute to the role deliverables connected with position below. In this position you can actively participate to our growth and make a significant impact in a fast-paced environment as;                            Position: Sr Field Service Representative                              Location: Delhi                                Your contributions to organisations growth                                Independent execution of Installation/ commissioning, overhauling and Troubleshooting of Reciprocating Compressors in Refinery and petrochemical industries - local and global sites.                              Site In-charge and contact person at site for customer, agents, contractor and project manage for Inspection, revision, revamp & dismantling of reciprocating compressor and auxiliary parts.                              Ability to analyse situations and make a decision and provide immediate feedback to Customers to keep the machines active and running.                              Consolidated site reports and measurements for records.                              Hands-on experience for using various measuring instruments, lifting / shifting of parts. column2: We are actively seeking a highly skilled and experienced Automation Technician to join our industrial automation company, specializing in installation, commissioning, AMC (Annual Maintenance Contracts), panel works, and service-related activities     The successful candidate will play a pivotal role in ensuring the efficient operation and maintenance of our automation systems, contributing to the success of our projects and meeting the service needs of our clients             Key Responsibilities:         Execute the installation of industrial automation systems, including PLCs, HMIs, and control panels, ensuring adherence to project specifications and safety standards.     Implement scheduled preventive maintenance tasks on automation systems covered under AMC.     Respond promptly to unplanned breakdowns, ensuring minimal downtime for our clients.     Collaborate with the engineering team to assemble and wire control panels for automation projects.     Conduct panel modifications, upgrades, and troubleshooting as required.     Respond to service calls for automation system issues, diagnose problems, and perform necessary repairs.     Provide on-site and remote technical support to clients, ensuring quick issue resolution.     Collaborate with the project management team to ensure timely completion of service contracts and projects.     Communicate effectively with clients to understand their requirements and address any concerns.     Conduct quality checks on completed installations, ensuring compliance with industry standards.       Requirements:       Degree or diploma in Automation, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.     Proven experience as an Automation Technician, specifically in installation, commissioning, AMC, panel works, and service.     Strong knowledge of control panel wiring and assembly.     Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.     Familiarity with various industrial sensors, actuators, and control devices.     Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team.     Excellent communication skills and customer-oriented approach.       If you have a passion for industrial automation services and possess the skills to excel in installation, commissioning, and maintenance activities, we encourage you to apply and be a valuable part of our dedicated team.     Screening: Our HR team will review all applications and shortlist candidates who meet the minimum qualifications for the role.     Interview: Shortlisted candidates will be invited for an initial phone interview with the HR team.     Assessment: Candidates who got selected will be invited for a final interview.     Offer: The selected candidate will be offered the position, pending satisfactory reference and background checks.
column11: Project management, Industrial automation, Issue resolution, HR, Sensors, Automation systems, Troubleshooting, Control panel, Technical support, Preventive maintenance

column2: Santinikatan Polytechnic Collage is looking for Technical Assistant to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey         Troubleshooting    : Helping users or customers troubleshoot technical issues they encounter with software, hardware, or systems.            Technical Support    : Providing support via email, phone, or in person to help users resolve technical problems or answer questions about products or services.            Documentation    : Creating and maintaining technical documentation, including manuals, guides, and FAQs, to assist users in understanding and using products or services.            Software Installation and Configuration    : Assisting with the installation, configuration, and maintenance of software applications and systems.            System Maintenance    : Performing routine maintenance tasks, such as updates, patches, and backups, to ensure the smooth operation of systems and applications.            Training    : Conducting training sessions or workshops to educate users or employees on how to use new software or technology effectively.            Research and Evaluation    : Researching new technologies, tools, or solutions that could improve efficiency or solve existing problems within the organization.

column2: If you are an RTU, SCADA expert professional, Emerson has an exciting role for you! We are looking for a RTU, SCADA Service Engineer in Oil and Gas domain to work with our ETS Team       In this role you will work independently and as a part of a team to extend support on domestic or international sites for configuration, testing, engineering, commissioning, SAT etc       We value autonomy, self-reliance, fast movers, a passion for robust and maintainable tests, and above all, the ability to ship a quality product                 In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:             RTU/SCADA precommisioning, Commissioning, SAT etc.         Demonstrate high level of flexibility, commitment, and ownership.         Short term Travel to onshore or offshore sites within India or other countries         Contribute to the overall quality of the organization in the engineering space.         Ensuring high performance on a variety of platforms.         Creating standard procedures documentation for repat use.          Review Deliverables for Quality Accuracy with Peers Lead.         Monitor Compliance to process/Targets         Maintain QMS system for defects, rework other indicators.         Maintaining Cost, quality schedule as per contractual terms             Who You Are:            You promote high visibility of shared contributions to goals. You quickly and significantly take action in constantly evolving, unexpected situations. You actively seek input from pertinent sources to make timely and well-informed decisions. You handle the risk that comes with moving forward when the outcome is not certain.               For This Role, You Will Need:             Minimum 3-7 years experience in SCADA Engineering          Experience with various RTUs and SCADA         Experience of Emerson OE SCADA and ControlWave RTU is added advantage.         Detailed hands-on experience on programming, Design, Application programming.         Good hands-on Modbus, OPC and DNP3 communication          Exposure to Radio and Wireless communication between RTU s and Host Systems like SCADA         Experience in Server Installation, Windows Administration, and networking.         Field Instrumentation knowledge for Flow meters, pressure temperature transmitters, control valves etc.         FAT and SAT experience of SCADA with domestic and international clients          Customer/vendor/Factory Liaison to fulfill documentation and inspection requirements.          Coordinate Tests/Inspections of all bought out/fabricated items.         Computer skills in Windows, Outlook, MS Word, Adobe Acrobat and Excel.             Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:                 Degree in Instrumentation Control / Electrical / Electronics Engineering         Basic understanding of networking protocols and concepts         Capable of describing and documenting for overall Project strategy         Contribute to and help maintain the engineering team         Excellent written and verbal communication skills          Innovative mind set.         Thrive for Results         Being Organizationally Savvy         Interpersonal Savvy         Business Ethics Integrity

column2: Skill required:  IX Product Engineering Services - Digital Site Designing Designation:  Engineering Services Associate Manager Qualifications: BE  Years of Experience: 10 to 14 years  About Accenture Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song all powered by the worlds largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com  What would you do? Industry X operations enables end-to-end operations integration through data & digital twin to operate client core processes and client product centric operations. Moving to an intelligent operating model powered by data, digital technologies and talent unlocked value at the 'seams'The Digital Site Designing team focuses on building operational sites for desktop and mobile devices. The team uses tools and platforms like Adobe Campaign Modules, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and JavaScript frameworks to perform their day to day operations. What are we looking for? Detail orientation Ability to work well in a team  Roles and Responsibilities:  Position Overview:As a Junior CAD DesignerEMS Display Developer/Builder, the resource will play a pivotal role in creating and enhancing single line drawings using OSI Monarch software. In addition to your design responsibilities, you will be involved in peer reviewing drawings within the team. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in CAD design, and preferably possess knowledge of electrical engineering principles.Responsibilities:OSI Monarch CAD DesignDisplay Development (similar to CAD drawings):1.Create single line drawings using OSI Monarch software.2.Develop accurate and detailed drawings displays from scratch or enrich converted output, ensuring adherence to defined display standards.2.3.Interpret base level engineering diagrams or existing displays to build new displays.3.4.Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers and product designers, clients and onshore team to understand specidicspecific requirements and specifications.Peer Review:1.Collaborate with team members to conduct thorough peer reviews of CAD drawingsEMS Displays.2.Provide constructive feedback to ensure the accuracy, completeness, and compliance of drawings with industry standards, internal display standards, and internal guidelines.Quality and DoucumentationDocumentation:1.Ensure the accuracy and completeness of CAD drawings,EMS Displays, addressing feedback from peer reviews, clients and project leads2.Maintain organized and up-to-date documentation of drawings and changes incorporated. 3.Assist in SIT in collaboration with clients4.Ensure drawing display handover documentation is upto date 5.Adhere to predefined KPIs of accuracy, timeliness etc. Continuous Improvement:1.Stay current with industry trends and advancements in OSI Monarch CAD designdisplay building.2.Participate in training and development opportunities to enhance skills and knowledge.Qualifications:1.Bachelor's degree or equivalent in a relevant field (e.g., CAD design, electrical engineering). OR 1.Proficiency in at least one CAD software (preferably OSI Monarch) 2.Strong Basic understanding of single line drawings and electrical engineering principles.3.Detail-oriented with excellent organizational and time-management skills.4.Effective communication and collaboration skills.5.Work UK hours Qualification BE

column2: Hitachi Energy Service is looking for a Market Analyst who will serve as a strategic business developer to reshape the way we quantify, evaluate, and estimate the market size for lifecycle services. Reporting directly to the Global Head of Service Strategy & Portfolio Management.           Your Responsibilities:             Service market model    - quantitative model Hitachi Energy Service market to account Classic/Transactional services on HE and Other-OEM equipment, IoT-based / connect-asset driven advanced services, fully-Servitized (CAPEX to OPEX) T&D market, over next decade           Service Target Market -    translate market-sizing into target-market definitions for relevant customer segments (e.g., utilities, new growth segments, etc.), identifying service value-pools along with current equipment delivery, and future installed base-related service activity           Service value creation    - stipulate enhancement opportunities (e.g., through digital) over the lifecycle by analyzing the cost incurred by customers, and customer-spend across asset lifecycle, e.g., on AC substation equipment from the plan, build, operate & maintain phase; Sizing impact of maintenance methodologies (TBM, RBM ) on total value of ownership           Service Competitive Intelligence -    constantly monitor market activity for the evolution of the service competitive landscape (e.g., PE-buyouts) building a comprehensive model for global service market-shares           Growth Plans / Account Mgmt.    - Complement key Marketing & Sales processes by introducing Service drivers for Market and Demand estimations, Service Target market, and Service Account Growth Planning            Service thought leadership    - proactively challenge product mgmt. & organization to develop a service mindset, by converting quantitative models into strategic documents for communication & thought leadership           Design-for-Serviceability    - leverage holistic model factoring in CAPEX and OPEX costs (incl. periodicity & intensity of lifecycle events) to guide serviceability-linked design.         Living Hitachi Energy s core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.               Your Background:           Bachelors/Masters degree in a quantitative field (e.g., Economics); Master of Business Administration (MBA) is highly preferred.         2+ years experience with a management consulting firm, investment bank, or similar         5+ years experience in B2B industry; ideally with a Service-based organization         Strong knowledge of and experience using Microsoft Office Suite         Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions.         Native-like command in English: this is a global role demanding senior stakeholder engagement (S/VP-level)

column1: Vision, Robotics Engineer For Reputed Automation Company, Chennai
column2: Vision Robotics Engineer for Reputed Automation Company, Chennai If you are meeting below criteria,  Please share your CV to jagannaath@kamms.net and also Whatsapp @ 7092689999 We are seeking a highly skilled and innovative Vision Robotics Engineer to join our dynamic team. The successful candidate will play a key role in developing and implementing cutting edge vision systems and robotics solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in computer vision, robotics, and machine learning, with a passion for pushing the boundaries of technology in automation and robotics. Job description Position Name:  Vision Robotics Engineer  Job Location:  Ambatture, Chennai Job Type:  Full time/ Permanent  Qualification:  Diploma/BE - EEE Experience: Min 1+ years as Vision Robotics Engineer  Responsibilities: 1. Design, develop, and implement advanced computer vision algorithms for robotic perception, object detection, tracking, and recognition.  2. Integrate vision systems with robotic platforms to enable autonomous navigation, manipulation, and decision-making.  3. Develop machine learning models for tasks such as object classification, pose estimation, and scene understanding.  4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand requirements and design solutions that meet project goals and objectives.  5. Conduct research and experimentation to evaluate the performance of vision algorithms and robotic systems in real-world environments.  6. Optimize algorithms for real-time performance and efficiency on embedded hardware platforms.  7. Develop software tools and frameworks for data collection, annotation, and analysis to support vision and robotics research and development. 8.Stay current with the latest advancements in computer vision, robotics, and artificial intelligence research and technologies.  9. Contribute to patent filings, technical documentation, and research publications.  10. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers and interns. Requirements: Exposure to Machine Vision, industrial / factory automation applications, Familiarity to PLC Understanding the customer requirements and visit customer site to prove the applications.Experience with vision systems from reputed brands like Omron ,cognex, keyence,Basler etc Some experience in Robot vision like OMRON ,Fanuc, ABB, Kuka etc is an added advantage Some PLC Programming experience using OMRON, Siemens, Allen Bradley, Mitsubishi, etc Expertise in their vision tools and programming Knowledge about lighting for machine vision and light effects Camera selection, camera adjustments, Lens selection Knowledge and experience in proving various vision applications Vision applications for robotics applications Good documentation, presentation, communication, organizational and interpersonal skills Ability to handle challenging customer situations Good analytical and problem solving skills Good understanding of mechanical, electrical, and industrial automation systems. Ability to work independently as well as in a collaborative environment Ability to travel up to 35 to 40% of the time, occasionally on short notice through out Tamil Nadu /Bangalore Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Robotics or a related field.  Previous experience working in interdisciplinary teams on robotics projects involving mechanical, electrical, and software engineering disciplines. Additional Skills Familiarity with various PLC platforms and programming languages (e.g., ladder logic, structured text). Knowledge of industrial automation systems and processes. Ability to work independently and in a team environment. Detail-oriented with a focus on precision in programming. Additional Benefits: Health and retirement benefits. Professional development opportunities. Dynamic and collaborative work environment. If you are a motivated Robotic Engineer with a passion for problem-solving and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions, we invite you to apply. Join us and be a key player in shaping the future of our automation processes. Apply now!

column2: OTIS is looking for Production / Maintenance - Field Technician to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey         Equipment Maintenance    : Conducting routine inspections, preventive maintenance, and repairs on production machinery, equipment, and systems to ensure optimal performance, minimize downtime, and prevent costly breakdowns.            Troubleshooting and Diagnostics    : Identifying and diagnosing equipment malfunctions, electrical issues, mechanical failures, and other technical problems using diagnostic tools, manuals, and technical documentation.            Repair and Restoration    : Performing corrective maintenance tasks, component replacements, adjustments, and calibration procedures to restore equipment functionality and compliance with performance specifications.            Safety Compliance    : Adhering to safety protocols, procedures, and regulations while performing maintenance activities, including lockout/tagout procedures, personal protective equipment (PPE) usage, and safe work practices to prevent accidents and injuries.            Inventory Management    : Maintaining inventory levels of spare parts, consumables, and supplies needed for equipment maintenance and repairs. Ordering, stocking, and tracking inventory to ensure availability and readiness for maintenance tasks.            Documentation and Reporting    : Documenting maintenance activities, work orders, repair logs, equipment history, and maintenance schedules using computerized maintenance management systems (CMMS) or manual records for tracking, analysis, and reporting purposes.            Predictive Maintenance    : Implementing predictive maintenance techniques such as vibration analysis, thermography, oil analysis, and ultrasonic testing to monitor equipment health, detect potential failures, and schedule maintenance proactively.            Continuous Improvement    : Participating in continuous improvement initiatives and root cause analysis (RCA) processes to identify opportunities for process optimization, reliability enhancement, and cost reduction in equipment maintenance and operations.            Team Collaboration    : Collaborating with production operators, maintenance engineers, supervisors, and other stakeholders to coordinate maintenance activities, prioritize work orders, and ensure seamless integration of maintenance schedules with production schedules.            Technical Expertise    : Possessing a strong technical background in mechanical systems, electrical systems, pneumatics, hydraulics, PLCs (Programmable Logic Controllers), and other industrial automation technologies to troubleshoot and maintain complex machinery and equipment.
column11: pneumatics, repair, corrective maintenance, predictive maintenance, maintenance engineering, preventive maintenance, equipment maintenance, root cause analysis, hydraulics, system, maintenance management, plcs, electrical equipment, vibration analysis

Job description Position Name: Controls Engineers Assembly Machines and automation Technology Industrial Automation MNC Permanent Base Location:  Penukonda, Anantapur District, Andhra Pradesh Job Type:  Permanent/Full Time Experience :  For BE/B.Tech - 3 + Years For 10th + Diploma Candidates - 9 Years experience required For 10th + 12th+ Diploma - 6 Years experience required     This position is responsible for the start-up and debug of machine tool equipment. General PC and Networking skills Understanding and ability to change NC Sequences Example Fixture Clamping Sequence Understanding and ability to read Hydraulic, Pneumatic and Coolant Hardware Documentation and its settings. column2: Role & responsibilities     Site engineering and leading construction/installation activities at power plant sites. Development of systems and tools for various mechanical refurbishment operations. Scheme development for activities such as coolant channel replacement, feeder replacement, and system refurbishment for nuclear power plants. Erection and installation of nuclear components such as calandria, end shield, calandria tubes, coolant channels, coolant feeders, coolant headers, control rod drive mechanisms, etc. Implementation of engineering changes/system upgrades in brown field projects. Production of manufacturing packages, coordination with manufacturer/contractor, review of vendor drawings/documents. Production of deliverables detailed equipment/tool specifications, component/material specifications, tool performance test specifications.? Preparation of plant maintenance schedules, access, lifting and maintenance strategies, technical risk assessments, and commissioning strategies, cost and programme estimations. Coolant channel replacement, primary coolant feeder replacement and replacement/refurbishment of other nuclear components/systems. Field co-ordination of mechanical activities mentioned above. Development of project technical proposals, scopes, schedules and budget estimates for field work. ? Walk-downs to assess system configuration, evaluation of system/component degradation and material condition. Witness the pre-commissioning/commissioning activities by the contractor/vendor and produce/review all relevant documentation. Strategy development for in-service inspection and testing. Review of 2D and 3D CAD drawings/models and bill of materials. Plant refurbishment, operational improvement and life extension activities.

column2: **Job Description** We are seeking an enthusiastic and experienced Laser Service Engineers to join our team. As a laser service engineer, you will be responsible for the pre-sales and after-sales service of solid-state lasers. **Responsibilities** - Demonstrate and test to show customers the advanced and superior features of our solid-state lasers; - ?Provide technical support and consultation services to customers, offer operation training to ensure they can use our lasers correctly and safely; - Troubleshoot laser faults by providing on-site or remote services to help customers resolve the issues; - ?Repair faulty lasers; - ?Provide customers with standby lasers for replacement to ensure their normal production is not affected. **Requirements** -Bachelor's degree or above, technical/ engineering background in the laser/ electro-optic industry preferred; - Minimum of 2 years of experience in laser service or a related field; - Excellent communication skills, sales techniques, and customer service awareness; - Familiarity with laser products and the market, a deep understanding of laser technology is a plus; - Strictly adhere to safety regulations to ensure the safe operation of solid-state lasers; - Strong team spirit and a high sense of responsibility. **What We Offer** - Competitive salary and commission system; - Comprehensive training system, providing professional skills and training on laser operation and maintenance; - Broad career development opportunities and promotion prospects; - A good team atmosphere and working environment. Join us to explore the laser market and create brilliance together! **How to Apply** Please send your resume to maimanlaser@maimanlaser.com, with the subject line "Laser Service Engineer - Your Name". We look forward to your joining!

Develop technical credibility and manage customer relationships by going the extra mile and representing KUKA with pride and professionalism. Participate actively in the promotion and sale of parts and services every time an opportunity arises. Knowledge of the fundamentals of customer service for phone and face-to-face contact with customers.          Multicultural sensitivity and understanding are a must while interacting with customers.          Structured, proactive, and goal-oriented way of working.          Strong work ethic, drive to succeed, customer service orientation as well as strong organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills and ability to multi-task and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. column2: Respond and attend to guest repair requests.    Communicate with guests/customers to resolve maintenance issues with little to no supervision.    Perform preventive maintenance on tools and equipment,  including cleaning and lubrication.    Visually inspect tools,  equipment,  or machines.    Carry equipment (eg,  tools,  radio).    Identify,  locate,  and operate all shut-off valves for equipment and shut-offs for buildings.    Maintain maintenance inventory and requisition parts and supplies as needed.    Assure each day s activities and problems that occur are communicated to the other shifts using approved communication programs and standards.    Display proficiency in any one of the following categories,  above average skills in two more of the following categories and basic skills in the remaining categories: air conditioning and refrigeration,  electrical,  mechanical,  plumbing,  pneumatic/electronic systems and controls,  carpentry and finish skills,  kitchen equipment,  vehicles,  energy conservation,  and/or general building management.    Display solid knowledge and skill in the safe use of hand and power tools and other materials required to perform repair and maintenance tasks.    Display basic ability to repair or replace PVC copper pipe (including soldering).    Troubleshoot and perform basic repair on all types of equipment (eg,  pump and motor replacement),  plumbing (eg,  plunge toilets and unclog drains),  electrical equipment including lamps,  cosmetic items,  extension cords,  vacuum cleaners,  internet devices,  replace electrical switches and outlets,  and other guestroom items.    Program TV's and perform general housekeeping and engineering-related duties.    Assist with surface preparation and painting,  minor drywall and wood trim repair,  light bulb and A/C filter replacement and the complete and thorough cleanup of the painting or repair area.    Use the Lockout/Tagout system before performing any maintenance work.    Display working knowledge of all engineering computer programs related to preventative maintenance,  energy management,  and other systems,  including devices that interact with such programs.    Perform mid-level troubleshooting of hotel Mechanical,  Electrical,  and Plumbing (MEP) systems.    Display the ability to train and mentor other engineers (eg,  Engineer I).    Display ability to perform Engineer on Duty responsibilities,  including readings and rounds.           Follow all company and safety and security policies and procedures; report any maintenance problems,  safety hazards,  accidents,  or injuries; complete safety training and certifications; and properly store flammable materials.    Ensure uniform and personal appearances are clean and professional,  maintain confidentiality of proprietary information,  and protect company assets.    Welcome and acknowledge all guests according to company standards,  anticipate and address guests  service needs,  assist individuals with disabilities,  and thank guests with genuine appreciation.    Adhere to quality expectations and standards.    Develop and maintain positive working relationships with others,  support team to reach common goals,  and listen and respond appropriately to the concerns of other employees.    Speak with others using clear and professional language.    Move,  lift,  carry,  push,  pull,  and place objects weighing less than or equal to 50 pounds without assistance and heavier lifting or movement tasks with assistance.    Move up and down stairs,  service ramps,  and/or ladders.    Reach overhead and below the knees,  including bending,  twisting,  pulling,  and stooping.    Enter and locate work-related information using computers.    Perform other reasonable job duties as requested.           PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS     Education:                               High school diploma or G. E. D.  equivalent and vocational or technical background.       Related Work Experience:      Experience in general maintenance,  exterior and interior surface preparation,  and painting.                                                       At least 2 years of hotel engineering/maintenance experience.       Supervisory Experience:         No supervisory experience.         REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS  License or Certification:          Valid Driver s License                                                     Universal Chlorofluorocarbon (CFC) Certification                                                     Must meet applicable state and federal certification and/or licensing requirements.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS   License or Certification:            Valid Driver s License                   Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law.       Marriott Hotels strive to elevate the art of hospitality, innovating at every opportunity while keeping the comfort of the oh-so-familiar all around the globe. As a host with Marriott Hotels, you will help keep the promise of  Wonderful Hospitality. Always.  by delivering thoughtful, heartfelt, forward-thinking service that upholds and builds upon this living legacy. With the name that s synonymous with hospitality the world over, we are proud to welcome you to explore a career with Marriott Hotels. In joining Marriott Hotels, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International.  Be  where you can do your best work,  begin  your purpose,  belong  to an amazing global team, and  become  the best version of you.       JW Marriott is part of Marriott Internationals luxury portfolio and consists of more than 100 beautiful properties in gateway cities and distinctive resort locations around the world. JW believes our associates come first. Because if you re happy, our guests will be happy. JW Marriott associates are confident, innovative, genuine, intuitive, and carry on the legacy of the brand s namesake and company founder, J.Willard Marriott. Our hotels offer a work experience unlike any other, where you ll be part of a community and enjoy true camaraderie with a diverse group of co-workers. JW creates opportunities for training, development, recognition and most importantly, a place where you can pursue your passions in a luxury environment with a focus on holistic well-being. Treating guests exceptionally starts with the way we take care of our associates. That s The JW Treatment . In joining JW Marriott, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International.  Be  where you can do your best work,   begin  your purpose,  belong  to an amazing global team, and  become  the best version of you.

column2: About Company and Profile Frootle india Pvt. Ltd is a leading partner for International brands in Lifestyle, Wellness, Home & Kitchen, Power and Entertainment appliances category for India Sub-Continent. Some of the well known brands are - Ecovacs - Robotic Vacuum Cleaners  Kuvings - Cold press Juicers Tineco - Floor Washer and Stick Vacuum cleaner Coway - Air purifiers Instant Brands - Electric Pressure Cooker and Air Fryer EcoFlow - Power Stations XGIMI - Smart Portable Projectors Website:  www.frootleindia.com We are looking for enthusiastic engineers who want to build their career in core engineering profile with these global brands pioneering in latest industry technology. Roles and Responsibilities Using various strategies and tools to provide effective solutions to customers' concerns. Communicating with clients, engineers, and other technicians to ensure that services are delivered effectively. Promptly following up on service requests and close them effectively Delivering demonstrations to ensure that customers are educated on safe and effective equipment use. Build and maintain relationships and rapport with customers. Ensure customer satisfaction and good experience. Coordinating and facilitating a smooth flow of communication within the internal teams. Retain existing customers and increase brand loyalty Inform customers about new features and functionalities. Follow up with customers to ensure their technical issues are resolved. Gather customer feedback and share it with our Product, Sales, and Marketing teams. Manage customer relationships and create repeat purchase Required Candidate profile A bachelor's degree in Mechanical/Electronics/Mechatronics/Robotics Engineering Excellent verbal, listening and customer service skills.  Ability to identify problem and solve it proactively Ability to deal with multiple requests  Ability to remain patient and professional under pressure. Superb work ethic and a growth mindset. The ability to convince and explain technical information to customers. The ability to teardown product and understand parts involved and how it works.  English & Local Regional Language Mandatory Vehicle (2-wheeler)  Mandatory . Immediate joining. Freshers preferred. Perks and Benefits  - Performance based Sales and Feedback Incentives (best in the industry) - Complete travel allowance - Paid Sick leave - Performance Bonus  - Complete Training with Industry experts

column2: Conduct Field Visits: Travel to customer sites to perform maintenance, troubleshooting,and repair services as per service requests and schedules..             Electrical Troubleshooting: Analyze and resolve electrical problems in control panels, circuits, sensors, and other electrical components in a wide range of equipment.             Preventive Maintenance: Perform routine maintenance checks and inspections on machinery to identify potential issues and prevent breakdowns.             Technical Skills: Strong knowledge of mechanical systems, electrical circuits, and troubleshooting techniques. Proficiency in reading technical drawings and schematics.             Installation and Commissioning: Assist with the installation and commissioning of new equipment at customer sites, ensuring proper functionality and adherence to safety guidelines.             Technical Support: Provide technical support and guidance to customers, both on-site and over the phone, to help resolve technical issues and answer product-related inquiries.         Documentation: Maintain accurate and detailed service records, including service reports, work orders, and parts used, to ensure proper documentation of service activities..             Customer Relations: Build and maintain positive relationships with customers by delivering prompt and efficient service, addressing their concerns professionally, and ensuring their needs are met.             Training: Stay updated with the latest product knowledge and industry trends through ongoing training and development programs.             Problem-Solving Abilities: Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to think analytically and find effective solutions to complex technical issues.         Time Management: Excellent time management skills to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and handle emergencies efficiently.         Customer-Centric Approach: A customer-focused mindset with a dedication to providing exceptional service.         Safety Compliance: Follow all safety protocols and guidelines while performing fieldwork to ensure the safety of oneself and others.

column2: Position:- Assistant Manager Department:- Customer Service Location:- Ahmedabad     ROLE OBJECTIVE Provide the field battery repairing and analysis report for product service and quality improvement . Repairing fault ,serviceing Batteries provide efficiant service all time.   KEY   ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES  Responsible for warranty support of lithium-ion battery pack making repair and troubleshooting ang investigating field issue, and communicate Quality, production, testing, R&D of lithium- ion battery/ESS systems as allotted to them and give proper report.   Communication with internal and external customer.   Preparation of Monthly field complaint MIS and publish with CFT team for product improvement.   Responsible for Reconciliation of field and plant service part and prepare the monthly report.   Prepare the Battery refurbishment centre plan at plant and field.   Impart Training to new employee, field team, vendor team and customers about the EESL product.   Strong understanding and fault rectification of Lithium -ion battery/ESS   Assist the Manager in follow -up related activities for field battery repair and troubleshooting ,8D, 5Why report.   Maintain the safety compliance, Kizen,5s.   Develop and design the service tools for field Engineer and partner team.   Responsible to provide detail failure analysis report for field return battery pack to manager.   Responsible for meeting with customer for other activities like AMC renewal any further requirement and understand the customer problem fully and communicating to manager on daily basis.   Develop systems for capturing, Analysing, and tracking the field issues on plant and based on analysis of the field return battery drive product improvement with CFT team.   Assisting to customer /End user during the commissioning / troubleshoot phase ensuring proper and safe operation of LI-ION Battery pack.   Deep dive into technical issues in Li-ION battery pack both hardware and software, Mobile app and collaborate with the relevant product development team.   Have good functional /technical, customer focus, communication, interpersonal and team working skill.   Keep up-to-date knowledge on new services and product offered by Exide Energy.   Fully Comply with HSE policy of the company.   Ensure that data are up to date on CRM system related to service and commissioning calls.     MANDATORY & DESIRED SKILLS   Mandatory Skills   Diploma / bachelors degree in electrical / Electronic engineering with min. 7-10 years of work experience.   Knowing about repair and troubleshooting of Lithium-ion battery/BMS/TCU/Chargers use in E-mobility and telecom Plant.   Experience in 2W/3W/E-bus/BMS/EV Charger li-ion battery experience is preferred.   Knowledge about BESS and RESS project for handling large project site   Understanding on electronic engineering principle, Technique, and practice.   In-depth knowledge of charging and discharging characteristics of various lithium batteries, as well as the charging principle of lithium battery BMS operation, Type of BMS   Hands on experience on various measuring tools like multimeter, clamp meter, power supply, chargers, DSO, CRO, Power analizer.    Familiar in working on data logging tools and protocol like CAN, RS 485, RS232, UART,     Desired Skills   Preferably from Battery/Stationary/Telecom industry. Fault analysis in BMS, PCM and other electronic board. Hands on experience on BMS /battery repair and analysis, Cell balancing, capacity testing Ability to liaison with supplier, vendors of battery child parts Understand and evaluate technical information related to job and making the 8D, 5why &analysis report. Good communications skill written/speaking.  Strong analytical capabilities, problem-solving and interpersonal skill.

column2: Objective of the role:   We are looking for an experienced Executive Engineer to oversee all technical IFM activities. The Executive Engineer will report to Assistant Facility Manager. The ideal candidate will be well-organized and able to lead a large team and showcase phenomenal efficiency to ensure our businesss accommodation is problem-free and safe so that employees can work under the best conditions. Responsibilities To ensure 100 % uptime of client facilities across India Perform ongoing preventive maintenance and repair work on facility mechanical, electrical, and other installed systems, Maintain, operate all HVAC systems/ MEP/ and associated equipment, electrical equipment, plumbing systems, building management system, and building repairs; Perform facility inspections and report on condition affecting operations; Immediate respond when as an emergencies, Prepare and submit summary reports of conditions in buildings and recommend actions to be taken; IR, RCA, CAPA etc Review and understand equipment and methods of operation, BMS system, fire/life safety, and other systems; Comply with all safety procedures and requirements. Maintain compliance to City, County, State ordinances and codes. Support any afterhours building needs and activities as required. Establish Engineering & Operational procedures and roll out the same for site staff; Establish contacts with local authorities on the facility related issues and maintain the relationship. Responsible for all legal & authorities related compliances pertaining to facility & engineering systems; Plan and manage the budgets for Engineering & Operational contracts; Carry out Technical Audits for all installations at periodical intervals; Review the maintenance/service practices of M&E Contractors to deliver quality work practices in line with the manufacturer recommendations; Responsible for planning a critical spares list for all installations as per manufacturer?? recommendations and inventory; Responsible for development of all maintenance related schedules and shutdowns in consultation with Clients / OEMs; Periodically inspect the logbooks, checklists, History card and PPM schedules for a better management of Engineering systems; Work towards the ??ERO??down time and set up the practices to ensure the delivery of seamless service to Clients; Responsible for ensuring landlord?? compliance on availability of all statutory obligations such as CEIG, Fire, Lift, Explosives and stability certificate; Responsible for setting up the maintenance contracts to ensure the risk mitigation to the Client operations Ensure Planned Preventive Maintenance activities are undertaken in accordance with the schedule Ensure the implementation and management of Risk and Safety work practices to reduce any interruption to operations Implement the pre-emptive maintenance program to reduce the risk of sudden failures of critical equipment Ensure Planned Preventive Maintenance activities are undertaken in accordance with the schedule Sounds like you? To apply you need to be: Experience & Education 5 years minimum experience as Executive engineer or relevant position Well-versed in IFM operations and facilities management best practices Diploma in EEE/ BE-EEE with ?????C ?????License holder ? Good Nonverbal communication skills Must have keen learning skills in accordance with the dynamic nature of the client business Prior knowledge of tech based dash boards desirable Manage all FM related requirements for the location to the end user satisfaction levels and maintain JLL standards on deliverables Vendor Management , Scheduled Reports , Facility Trackers , MMR , SLA , Client Management , Builder Coordination Behavioral Competencies Strategic Thinking & Leadership Excellent verbal and written communication skills Excellent organizational and leadership skills Experience working in heavily matrixed environments and leading by influence What we can do for you: At JLL, we make sure that you become the best version of yourself by helping you realise your full potential in a fully entrepreneurial and inclusive work environment. If you harbour passion for learning and adapting new technologies, JLL will continuously provide you with platforms to enrich your technical domains. ?We will empower your ambitions through our dedicated Total Rewards Program, competitive pay and benefits package. column2: Company Description: Aurassure Private Limited is a company that provides environmental monitoring solutions for air pollution, urban flood, weather, and climate change. The company aims to raise awareness and promote sustainable development by providing real-time data, visualizations, trends, predictions, and alerts through its hardware and software platforms. Aurassure Private Limited has deployed its devices in various smart cities and has collaborated with global organizations, developmental agencies, NGOs, and researchers. Job Description: We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Service Engineer to join our dynamic team at Aurassure. The Service Engineer will play a crucial role in providing technical support and assistance to our customers, ensuring the optimal performance and functionality of our weather monitoring equipment. Responsibilities: 1. Installation and Commissioning: Install and commission Aurassure weather monitoring equipment at customer sites, ensuring proper setup and functionality. 2. Maintenance and Repair: Conduct routine maintenance checks, troubleshooting, and repair of weather monitoring equipment to ensure continuous operation and minimal downtime. 3. Customer Support: Provide technical support to customers via phone, email, or on-site visits, addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and offering guidance on equipment operation and maintenance. 4. Documentation: Maintain accurate records of service activities, including equipment maintenance logs, service reports, and customer communication, ensuring compliance with company standards and procedures. 5. Quality Assurance: Perform quality assurance checks on installed equipment to ensure adherence to Aurassure's quality standards and specifications. 6. Product Feedback: Collect and relay customer feedback and product performance data to the appropriate departments within Aurassure for continuous improvement and product development. Requirements: Experience: 0-2 years Minimum Qualification: Graduation (Physics/Chemistry/Environmental Science). Benefits: - Competitive salary commensurate with experience. - Health insurance coverage. - Opportunities for professional development and advancement within the company. - A collaborative and supportive work environment with a focus on innovation and excellence. Join Aurassure and be part of a team dedicated to delivering cutting-edge weather monitoring solutions that make a difference. Apply now and help shape the future of weather technology!

column2: Family Description       Customer Services (CS) covers customer service in different areas such as technical support, account support, operations, maintenance, network design / deployment / integration / transformation, and education. Generates revenue and the increase of customer satisfaction through planning, designing, deploying, integrating, optimising, operating, and maintaining phases.       Subfamily Description       Managed Services (MSE) is responsible for keeping the network running and proposing / conducting network upgrades based on business requirements. Covers technical managing and operating of agreed components of IT and telecommunications services provided to end users of Nokia customers, within contracts agreed with those customers.           Impact       Impact is short-term and departmental/project in scope. Accountable for quality, accuracy and efficiency. Actions and errors can have functional area impact.        Scope Contribution       Individual Contributor: Variety of complex tasks within area of responsibility, Demonstrates initiative contributes to problem solving. Acts with independence and discretion in routine matters. Makes decisions that affect own work. Managerial/Supervisory: May act as Team Leader or Project Leader with some direct supervisory responsibilities in addition to own work assignments. Variety of complex tasks within area of responsibility. Acts with independence and discretion in routine matters. Makes decisions that affect own work.       Innovation       Performs routine activites to meet departmental/project objectives. Requires moderate supervision. Applies commonly recognised concepts within their field of expertise. Shares knowledge with less experienced peers or have high collegial interaction. Raises innovative ideas. Demonstrates adaptability to changing business environments. Is willing to take on new roles or jobs appropriate to skill set in different environments and/or locations.        Communication       Works to influence others to accept job functions view/practices and agree/accept new concepts, practices, and approaches. May conduct briefings with senior leaders within the job function. May at times be required to negotiate regarding operational issues. Has cross-cultural knowledge and global mindset       Knowledge Experience       Established skills and knowledge of theory and principles within a professional discipline. Uses functionally specific knowledge.Typically 5-8 years directly related experience and a graduate equivalent degree.         Incident Manager role is responsible and accountable for overall end to end governance of all P1 P2 Incidents being reported from the network. This role is also end-to-end owner of Crisis Management, Escalation management, Bridge management, Executive Communication management, Critical Key SLA management, Emergency Change coordination, Vendor management, Post Incident Report Management, Floor Management and Outage Handling support.           To own and meet the target of Critical SLAs every month     To govern outages end-to-end and restore the Impact/services within SLA     To govern and manage the vendors/third parties on all outages     To be accountable for all the communications during outages that goes in paging to Customer and Nokia Management.     To act as a Crisis Manager and plan/do/act on the Crisis with end-to-end view of the network.     To act as single point of contact for Customer/Vendor/Third parties     Management for all issues as second level escalation     To govern and run the technical bridge and management bridges with Nokia, Customer vendors.     To drive the actions derived from the Customer Management bridges.     To prepare the SLA ratification Post incident report of high quality every month for all the reported outages.     To govern and run the incidents that are reported by CTO/GM/Head of ops through periodical bridge.     To review Emergency changes from both technical and service impact point of view and be the Sole Approver of all Emergency changes in the entire network.     To support GDC Management on BCP execution and any other Crisis from GDC.     Proven ability to work with others to meet common objectives and customer expectations.     Able to work in a changing environment and able to adapt with these changes.     Proven excellence in: Planning; Leadership, Communication, Negotiation, Problem Solving and Organizational influence.     Must be able to multitask effectively across other responsibilities.     Highly process-focused and Results/outcome oriented..     Can identify improvement opportunities and implement necessary changes.     Excellent written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills.     Strong facilitation skills and ability to gain consensus.     Takes initiative to creatively resolve issues and find solutions.     Proven ability to see business processes through a customer lens.     Strong negotiation, conflict resolution, and influencing skills.     Strong analytical skills, comfortable with data and statistics.     Data Driven decision maker and comfortable communicating with all levels within the organization.

column2: Service market model    - quantitative model Hitachi Energy Service market to account Classic/Transactional services on HE and Other-OEM equipment, IoT-based / connect-asset driven advanced services, fully-Servitized (CAPEX to OPEX) TD market, over next decade           Service Target Market -    translate market-sizing into target-market definitions for relevant customer segments (e.g., utilities, new growth segments, etc.), identifying service value-pools along with current equipment delivery, and future installed base-related service activity           Service value creation    - stipulate enhancement opportunities (e.g., through digital) over the lifecycle by analyzing the cost incurred by customers, and customer-spend across asset lifecycle, e.g., on AC substation equipment from the plan, build, operate maintain phase; Sizing impact of maintenance methodologies (TBM, RBM ) on total value of ownership           Service Competitive Intelligence -    constantly monitor market activity for the evolution of the service competitive landscape (e.g., PE-buyouts) building a comprehensive model for global service market-shares           Growth Plans / Account Mgmt.    - Complement key Marketing Sales processes by introducing Service drivers for Market and Demand estimations, Service Target market, and Service Account Growth Planning            Service thought leadership    - proactively challenge product mgmt. organization to develop a service mindset, by converting quantitative models into strategic documents for communication thought leadership           Design-for-Serviceability    - leverage holistic model factoring in CAPEX and OPEX costs (incl. periodicity intensity of lifecycle events) to guide serviceability-linked design. column2: Family Description       Customer Services (CS) covers customer service in different areas such as technical support, account support, operations, maintenance, network design / deployment / integration / transformation, and education. Generates revenue and the increase of customer satisfaction through planning, designing, deploying, integrating, optimising, operating, and maintaining phases.       Subfamily Description       Managed Services (MSE) is responsible for keeping the network running and proposing / conducting network upgrades based on business requirements. Covers technical managing and operating of agreed components of IT and telecommunications services provided to end users of Nokia customers, within contracts agreed with those customers.           Impact       Accountable for quality and accuracy of own output. Responsible for contribution to teamwork. Errors may have an impact on function/project/customer. Usually delivers results with a short-term, operational focus and limited impact on others.        Scope & Contribution       Individual Contributor: Participates as an individual contributor to the team, usually with limited professional expertise. Makes decisions affecting own work within set parameters, elevates others. Review priorities with a supervisor. High personal or low collegial interaction. Managerial/Supervisory: May act as Team Leader or Project Leader with some indirect supervisory responsibilities in addition to own work assignments.. Makes decisions that affect own work.        Innovation       Semi-routine tasks of moderate complexity require some discretion and judgment. Carries out tasks/activities according to assignment and set guidelines. A moderate degree of supervision and coaching is needed. Demonstrates initiative and adaptability to changing business environments.        Communication       Explains facts, practices, policies, etc to external and internal parties. Takes actions that respect to the needs and contributions of others and reaches agreement through flexibility and compromise. Manages situations where there is a common desire to reach solution within a team. Sometimes requires the ability to influence others outside of own job area on policies, practices, and procedures. Builds cross-cultural knowledge and global mindset.        Knowledge & Experience       Specialised or broader knowledge of theory and principles within a professional discipline. Typically 3-4 years of directly related experience and a graduate equivalent degree.           For one of the key functions of SOC/CEM operations       Autonomously performs tasks with a moderate level of guidance but within defined procedures / guidelines (EG diagnoses routine abnormalities within services delivered and manages their resolution, including through own actions or managing the process through others; routinely configures service delivery and / or service support (OSS) elements, analyses the Problem Base on Call Traces, performance data. Parameter level understanding of Domains).     Undertakes function through analysis of status or performance indicators / service configuration requirements and possible solutions, makes independent judgments, decisions and recommendations and solves a range of individual or commonly recurrent abnormalities / service configuration requirements through knowledge and technical experience. Able to correlate and debug in Technology domain.     Is able to Handle Multivendor Network. It is able to write scripts to fetch data from database to debug the problems.      Liaises, and takes leadership from an SOC/CEM real-time and day-to-day, end-to-end delivery perspective, with counterparts in other SOC/CEM functions, in other Nokia services groups (EG Customer Care, NOC CM, NOC FM, Customer Sales Marketing Organization) or in the customers organisation for individual incidents, problems, changes or risks.     Provides informal guidance and support to new team members with regard to the procedures to follow and the specific tasks required to perform the job effectively.     Translates to the next level of detail global standardised procedures / checklists to specifics for an MS customer.     May monitor the set of tickets / work orders received by the functional team, taking corrective action if there is a risk to, or breach of agreed service levels, including through the re-prioritisation of work and / or engagement of additional temporary resources.

column2: Fortis Healthcare Ltd is looking for Assistant Supervisor - Service Line Management to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey         Supporting Daily Operations    : The Assistant Supervisor assists in managing the day-to-day activities of the service line, ensuring that tasks are completed efficiently and effectively.              Team Leadership    : They may provide leadership and guidance to a team of employees within the service line, including assigning tasks, providing training, and monitoring performance.              Client and Customer Relations    : They help maintain positive relationships with clients or customers who utilize the services provided by the service line. This may involve addressing client inquiries or concerns, resolving issues, and ensuring client satisfaction.              Quality Assurance    : The Assistant Supervisor assists in maintaining high-quality standards for services provided within the service line. This includes ensuring compliance with industry regulations and internal policies, as well as implementing quality improvement initiatives.              Resource Management    : They help manage resources such as personnel, equipment, and materials within the service line to ensure optimal productivity and efficiency.              Data Analysis and Reporting    : The Assistant Supervisor may be responsible for collecting and analyzing data related to the performance of the service line. Process Improvement    : They assist in identifying opportunities for process improvement within the service line, streamlining workflows, and implementing best practices to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.

column2: Job Description: Service Engineer    Company: Schwing Stetter India Private Limited    Schwing Stetter India Private Limited is a leading manufacturer of construction equipment, specializing in concrete and construction machinery. We are seeking a skilled and experienced Service Engineer to join our team and provide technical support and service to our customers.    As a Service Engineer, you will be responsible for ensuring the proper functioning of Schwing Stetter machinery and equipment at customer sites. Your primary duties will include diagnosing and repairing equipment issues, conducting routine maintenance, and providing technical support to customers as needed. You will also be responsible for training customers on the proper use and maintenance of our equipment.    Key Responsibilities:    - Diagnose and repair technical issues with Schwing Stetter machinery and equipment at customer sites  - Conduct routine maintenance and inspections on equipment to ensure optimal performance  - Provide technical support to customers, including troubleshooting and resolving issues remotely or on-site  - Train customers on the proper operation and maintenance of Schwing Stetter equipment  - Collaborate with the sales and service team to ensure customer satisfaction and retention  - Keep accurate and detailed records of service and maintenance activities  - Stay up-to-date on the latest technical developments and advancements in Schwing Stetter equipment    Requirements:    - A bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering or a related field  - At least 3 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in the construction equipment industry  - Strong technical and mechanical skills  - Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities  - Good communication and customer service skills  - Ability to work independently and as part of a team  - Willingness to travel to customer sites as needed  - Familiarity with Schwing Stetter equipment is an advantage    At Schwing Stetter India Private Limited, we offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for career growth and development. If you are passionate about construction equipment and have the skills and experience required for this role, we would love to hear from you.    To apply for the position of Service Engineer, please send your resume and cover letter to [email protected] We look forward to welcoming a dedicated and talented individual to our team!    Roles and Responsibilities   Requirements:    - A bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering or a related field  - At least 3 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in the construction equipment industry  - Strong technical and mechanical skills  - Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities  - Good communication and customer service skills  - Ability to work independently and as part of a team  - Willingness to travel to customer sites as needed  - Familiarity with Schwing Stetter equipment is an advantage    At Schwing Stetter India Private Limited, we offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for career growth and development. If you are passionate about construction equipment and have the skills and experience required for this role, we would love to hear from you.    To apply for the position of Service Engineer, please send your resume and cover letter to [email protected] We look forward to welcoming a dedicated and talented individual to our team!

column2: If you are passionate about diesel engines and have a knack for problem-solving, then we have an exciting opportunity for you! Schwing Stetter India Private Limited is currently looking for a Diesel Engine Service Specialist to join our dynamic team.    As a Diesel Engine Service Specialist, you will be responsible for diagnosing, repairing, and maintaining diesel engines to ensure optimal performance. You will also be tasked with providing exceptional customer service by addressing any concerns or questions related to diesel engine maintenance and performance.    Key responsibilities:    - Diagnose and troubleshoot diesel engine issues using industry-standard diagnostic equipment and techniques.  - Perform routine maintenance on diesel engines, including oil changes, filter replacements, and fluid checks.  - Repair and replace faulty components in diesel engines, including fuel injection systems, cooling systems, and exhaust systems.  - Conduct performance tests and inspections to ensure diesel engines meet industry standards and regulations.  - Provide technical support and guidance to customers on diesel engine maintenance and operation.  - Keep detailed records of engine repairs, maintenance, and customer interactions.    Requirements:    - A strong understanding of diesel engine principles and mechanics.  - Previous experience working with diesel engines in a service or maintenance capacity.  - Proficiency in using diagnostic equipment and tools to troubleshoot engine issues.  - Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.  - Strong communication and customer service skills.  - Ability to work independently and as part of a team.    Why work with Schwing Stetter India Private Limited:    At Schwing Stetter India Private Limited, we are committed to providing our employees with a supportive and collaborative work environment. We believe in investing in our team members and providing opportunities for growth and advancement. As a Diesel Engine Service Specialist, you will have the chance to work with cutting-edge diesel engine technology and make a real impact on our customers??operations.    If you are passionate about diesel engines and are looking for a challenging and rewarding career, then we want to hear from you! Apply now to join our team as a Diesel Engine Service Specialist and be a part of our commitment to excellence in diesel engine servicing.    Roles and Responsibilities   If you have a passion for mechanics and enjoy working with diesel engines, then a career as a diesel engine service specialist might be the perfect fit for you. Diesel engine service specialists are responsible for maintaining, repairing, and servicing diesel engines in various types of vehicles and equipment. This rewarding and in-demand job requires a strong understanding of diesel engine technologies and a knack for problem-solving. In this blog, we will outline the roles and responsibilities of a diesel engine service specialist to give you a better understanding of what this career entails.    Roles and Responsibilities of a Diesel Engine Service Specialist:    1. Diagnosing engine issues: One of the main responsibilities of a diesel engine service specialist is to diagnose engine problems and determine the root cause of the issue. This may involve using diagnostic tools and equipment to identify any mechanical, electrical, or fuel system problems.    2. Performing engine repairs: Once the issue has been diagnosed, diesel engine service specialists are responsible for performing the necessary repairs to correct the problem. This may involve disassembling and reassembling engine components, replacing damaged parts, and conducting thorough inspections to ensure the engine is functioning properly.    3. Conducting routine maintenance: Diesel engines require regular maintenance to ensure they operate efficiently and last a long time. Diesel engine service specialists are responsible for performing routine maintenance tasks such as changing oil and filters, inspecting belts and hoses, and checking for any signs of wear or damage.    4. Providing technical support: Diesel engine service specialists may also be responsible for providing technical support to other automotive technicians or mechanics who are working on diesel engines. This may involve offering guidance and advice on complex engine issues and troubleshooting techniques.    5. Keeping accurate records: Maintaining detailed records of all service and repair work is an important part of a diesel engine service specialist's responsibilities. This includes documenting the work performed, parts replaced, and any diagnostic results to ensure accurate documentation of the engine's history.    6. Staying updated on industry trends: Diesel engine technology is constantly evolving, and as a diesel engine service specialist, it is important to stay updated on the latest industry trends, tools, and techniques. This may involve attending training courses, reading industry publications, and staying informed about new engine technologies.    7. Upholding safety standards: Diesel engine service specialists must always prioritize safety when working on engines. This includes following safety protocols, wearing appropriate protective gear, and ensuring that all repairs and maintenance work are performed safely and accurately.    In conclusion, the role of a diesel engine service specialist is critical in keeping diesel engines running smoothly and efficiently. By understanding the roles and responsibilities of this position, you can gain insight into the skills and expertise needed to succeed in this rewarding career. If you have a passion for diesel engines and enjoy working with complex machinery, a career as a diesel engine service specialist may be the perfect fit for you.

Previous experience carrying out maintenance / breakdown Management & service on Overhead Crane, EOT crane & JIB cranes. Ideally strong knowledge of Industrial Cranes. Supplementary   Requirement   ?? Willingness to travel in Different Industrial Sectors for lead generation. Must have Bike/Scooty/Car and License. Position   Overview   : Service Engineer, will be responsible for providing technical expertise and support in the maintenance, repair, Breakdown management, AMC/PMC & installation - Commissioning of industrial Crane, Overhead Crane, EOT Cranes. Key   Responsibilities   : .  Equipment   Maintenance   and   Repairs : Perform regular maintenance, inspections, and repairs on industrial Cranes & ensure they operate efficiently and safely. Troubleshoot issues and diagnose problems accurately to implement effective solutions promptly .  Installation   and   Commissioning:  Assist in the installation and commissioning of Cranes at client sites. Ensure all components are properly assembled, calibrated, and functioning correctly. .  Preventive   Maintenance:  Develop and execute preventive maintenance schedules for Overhead cranes & EOT cranes at client locations. Conduct routine checks, replace parts as needed, and proactively identify potential issues before they escalate. .  Documentation:  Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of service activities, including repairs, maintenance tasks, spare parts used, and other relevant information. Prepare service reports for clients and internal management. .  Spare   Parts   Management:  Keep track of inventory levels for spare parts and consumables. Coordinate with procurement and logistics teams to ensure timely availability of required parts. .  Safety   and   Compliance:  Adhere to safety guidelines and industry regulations while performing service tasks. Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures at all times. . Crane AMC ??PMC schedule & service activity / Paid ??ervice. .  Continuous   Improvement:  Identify opportunities for service process improvement and contribute to the enhancement of service efficiency and effectiveness. .  Technical   Knowledge:  Stay updated with the latest advancements in Crane segment & technology and relevant industry trends. Participate in training programs to enhance technical skills and knowledge. . Keeping the customer informed and ensure all work completed is done with their approval.

column2: This position is based in India and is responsible for the direction and coordination of field service related activities of Illumina products.     This includes technical and administrative support activities including installation, repair, preventative maintenance, and engineering change upgrades.     Working with our internal teams and channel partners, the incumbent ensures that World-Class service is provided to Illumina s customers by minimizing instrument down time and investigating customer complaints. He is also responsible for ensuring scheduled maintenance, upgrades and training are duly performed where required.             Position Responsibilities:         Assist with interfacing between the field organization and internal support structure by providing timely onsite technical assistance to Customers, Field Applications Scientist/Specialists, and Territory Account Managers     Serve as a focal point for problem resolution assistance to subsidiary or distributor support     Responsible for editing, writing, and modifying Service and Training manuals, Field Service Bulletins, and SOPs     Install, upgrade, repair, and maintain instrument systems in defined territory     Provide technical support to staff, contractors, and customers     Manage the Service Territory including distributor s service staff     Respond to service requests and ensure customer satisfaction     Manage service parts inventory levels     Maintain up to date customer information, technical files, and appropriate databases     Provide timely and accurate reports as requested     Works in conjunction with other staff to coordinate new system placements, develop leads, promote upgrades and contract renewals etc.     Maintains routine contact with existing customer base     Travel out of country may be necessary upon request     Travelling frequency at around 25%.           Listed responsibilities are an essential, but not exhaustive list, of the usual duties associated with the position. Changes to individual responsibilities may occur due to business needs.           Position Requirements:         BS in Electrical/Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, related degree with knowledge in the biotechnology/biomedical industry.     Minimum 5 years relevant experience     Must be highly motivated and have strong problem-solving ability     Excellent verbal and written communications skills     Must have good technical writing abilities     Must be able to work independently and as a team player     Computer experience and literacy a must     Familiarity with field optical alignments, robotics, electrical/electronics, and mechanical systems     Knowledge and skills typically acquired through previous positions in fast-paced corporate environments which involved responsibility for similar work                     Preferred Experience/Education/Skills:         Experience managing distributors is a plus
column11: Administration, Distribution management, Technical writing, Mechanical, Electronics, biomedical, Technical support, Robotics, Electricals, Electronics engineering
